name: Hunting Hero: Animal Wild
description:
Hunting Hero: Animal Wild!!!
Test your sniper skills and show your real shooting experience.Aiming at the dangerous wild animals is around the dark green fresh jungle areas is an outstanding experience. This amazing deadly simulator is here for enjoyment and fun.
Best 3d forest, arctic and desert environment
Aim at running wild animals.
HD graphics with realistic sound effects
Smooth game play & Interface with easy controls
Best sniper shooting experience in dark deadly jungle.
Best rifle and sniper gun for accurate shooting and hunting.
